tasks.command: docker compose up -d main-page highschool realestate-frontend realestate-backend

tasks.label: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Start Indexpage (Nginx)
tasks.command: if docker compose ps main-page highschool realestate-frontend realestate-backend 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'Up'; then docker compose up -d nginx-proxy; else echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Backend services not running! Run "1Ô∏è‚É£ Start Other Services" first.'; exit 1; fi

tasks.label: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Start Full Services
tasks.command: docker compose up -d && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ All services started!' && echo '' && docker compose ps

tasks.label: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Stop Indexpage (Nginx)
tasks.command: docker compose stop nginx-proxy && echo '‚úÖ Nginx stopped'

tasks.label: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Stop Other Services
tasks.command: docker compose stop main-page highschool realestate-frontend realestate-backend && echo '‚úÖ Other services stopped'

tasks.label: 6Ô∏è‚É£ Stop Full Services
tasks.command: docker compose down && echo '‚úÖ All services stopped and removed'

tasks.label: 7Ô∏è‚É£ Reload Nginx Config
tasks.command: docker compose exec nginx-proxy nginx -t && docker compose exec nginx-proxy nginx -s reload && echo '‚úÖ Nginx config reloaded'

tasks.label: 8Ô∏è‚É£ Rebuild and Restart Main-Page
tasks.command: docker compose stop main-page && docker rmi main-page:latest 2>/dev/null || true && docker build --no-cache -t main-page:latest ./main-page && docker compose up -d main-page && echo '' && echo '‚úÖ Main-page rebuilt (no cache) and restarted!' && docker compose logs --tail=20 main-page
